text: What's up everyone?

Today we are learning english with the 
highly successful british band Coldplay

they have so many great 
hits that it was really
hard to choose just a few for today's

lesson and if you watch until 
the end you will also learn

with a fun interview that Chris and 
Johnny did on the Ellen show!
I think we dreamed big without thinking

it might be possible right so 
when I said that I'm sure I

half felt it but also thought it was 
I was saying something ridiculous.

Do you want to understand 
natives even when we speak fast

without getting lost, without missing 
the jokes and without subtitles?

Just like Hassan who says that watching 
our channel in the last four months

is working like magic so 
if that sounds good to you

don't forget to hit that 
subscribe button and the bell

down below so that you don't 
miss any of our new lessons.

Do you find it difficult to 
understand fast speaking natives?

Then I highly recommend our 
Fluent with Friends course.

In this 48 week course you will learn 
with the first two seasons of Friends,

you'll receive PDF power lessons every 
week, vocabulary memorization software

access to our Fluency Circle global 
community and so much more and did

you know you can try it right now for 
free with our three-part Masterclass!

All you have to do is click up 
here or down in the description

below to learn more and sign up 
now we hope to see you there.

If you're enjoying this lesson 
then i highly recommend that you

check out our music lesson playlist 
where you'll find a whole range of

lessons from Queen to Lady Gaga 
all you have to do is click up

here or down in the description 
below to choose your next lesson.
